DOC.brief_summary: This prospective pilot study quantify change heart rate propofol administer inhalational anesthesia induction .
DOC.criteria: 1 . At least 1 year age old . 2 . Routine ( elective ) surgical patient ASA classification 1 2 ( healthy ) . 3 . Patients already schedule receive inhalational induction follow IV propofol . 1 . Premature infant less 30 week , less 60 week postgestational age time study .
